description:
WinMTR (Redux)
==============
**WinMTR (Redux)** in an extended fork of [Appnor's WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/) ([sourceforge](http://sourceforge.net/projects/winmtr/)) with IPv6 support and other different enhancements and bug fixes
summary: WinMTR is a Windows application which combines the functionality of the traceroute and ping utilities in a single network diagnostic tool.
author: White-Tiger,  Appnor
